section.p: Contains all documentation produced as a result of the autopsy.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] dateModified with data type Point In Time
This is the date the report was modified if it was modified after it was electronically signed/released.

Contains exactly one [1..1] referenceDate with data type Point In Time
This is the date and time that the autopsy SF515 was stored in TIU.

Contains exactly one [1..1] wasDiagnosisModified with data type Boolean
Diagnosis modified after report was electronically signed/released. 1= ' YES' or 0 = 'NO'.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateModified with data type Point In Time
This is the date the report was modified if it was modified after it was electronically signed/released.

Contains exactly one [1..1] referenceDate with data type Point In Time
This is the date and time that the autopsy SF515 was stored in TIU.

Contains exactly one [1..1] wasDiagnosisModified with data type Boolean
Diagnosis modified after report was electronically signed/released. 1= ' YES' or 0 = 'NO'.
